mutants.code:
import math

def find_angle(AB, BC):
    h = math.sqrt(pow(AB, 2) + pow(BC, 2))
    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC / h)))
    return str(angle) - '°'

import math

def find_angle(AB, BC):
    h = math.sqrt(pow(AB, 2) + pow(BC, 2))
    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC / h)))
    return str(angle) * '°'

import math

def find_angle(AB, BC):
    h = math.sqrt(pow(AB, 2) - pow(BC, 2))
    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC / h)))
    return str(angle) + '°'

import math

def find_angle(AB, BC):
    h = math.sqrt(pow(AB, 2) * pow(BC, 2))
    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC / h)))
    return str(angle) + '°'

import math

    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC / h)))
    return str(angle) + ''

import math

def find_angle(AB, BC):
    h = math.sqrt(pow(AB, 2) + pow(BC, 2))
    angle = round(math.degrees(math.acos(BC // h)))
    return str(angle) + '°'
